operations.bot: Welcome to Bandersnatch.
This game will test your reasoning and logical abilities.
Every choice you make impacts the story in ways beyond your comprehension.
At points you may want to give up at others the adrenaline will keep you on our nerves.
This is a game of choices, are you ready to jump in?

operations.prompt: Are you ready to make your first choice?

operations.bot: Nirav Modi was a corporate slave, stuck in the monotonous loop of a 9-5 job. Your classic case of Eat-Sleep-Work repeat. But he wasn’t your average engineer, with a degree from IIT and an outstanding academic record he was stuck with an underpaid overworked job.

Nirav was fed up of this monotony and to stick it to the system he planned a heist. He got like minded fellow engineers and robbed 500 million Dollars from PCB national bank.You are the Chief Investigating officer on the case. You’ve nabbed all of his associates andyou’re your after Nirav.
Some hints before you begin:Nirav is :-Superhero comic nerd Quentin Tarantino fan Coding enthusiast
We are at Niravs Residence Searching for some clues.
Looks like we’ve found a brochure and a letter.

operations.prompt: Which clue will you choose?

operations.bot: On examining the brochure, you see that further details are located at the workshop.
Go to the workshop and scan the area for the clue.
The letter:

My dear annie, I’m heading out to Phi Phi. The heist was successful but my associates have been caught. It’s upto me to flee with the money. I don’t know when I’ll find you but we’ll meet soon in Phi Phi. Till then I love you, stay safe. -NM
